Plot:
In the Year of Darkness, 2029, the rulers of this planet devised the ultimate plan.
They would reshape the Future by changing the Past. The plan required something that felt no pity.
No pain. No fear. Something unstoppable. They created 'THE TERMINATOR'.
A human-looking, apparently unstoppable cyborg is sent from the future to kill Sarah Connor;
Kyle Reese is sent to stop it.
